data.title: GamesRadar+
data.meta_description: GamesRadar+ takes you closer to the games, movies and TV you love.
data.text:
I've been playing spooky Dead By Daylight spin-off The Casting of Frank Stone, and let me tell you: this Frank Stone fella seems like bad news

Preview Prepare for severed ears, gory deaths, and plenty of Fog

News That poor Gleeok didn't see it coming

The most realistic-looking Sims 4 competitor I've ever seen is bringing its character creator to Steam, and I still can't believe it comes from the PUBG studio

News Step aside, Create-A-Sim

As Activision suddenly kills a long-awaited Call of Duty mod, Infinity Ward veteran encourages the publisher to "build systems to help your UGC community, not strangle it"

News The H2M-Mod team had to cease all operations hours before launch

Monster Hunter Wilds is really putting the Chatacabra through it in the weapon showcases, and fans are almost feeling bad for the beastie

News It's hammer time!
